Font Rendering Issues in GitHub Desktop | Original

Home 2025.01

GitHub Desktop version 3.4.13 (arm64) exhibits font rendering issues in the text diff panel for specific languages. The problematic languages include:

  • Chinese (both Simplified and Traditional)
  • Hindi
  • Japanese

However, the following languages render correctly:

  • English
  • Spanish
  • German
  • Arabic
  • French
